attributes.comment:
Seriously??? I mean, come on. We aren't all made of money! Most of us are
hardworking American people, but we aren't all (or even mostly!) rich! My husband
of 2 years came over (from England) on a finance visa in 2005. We have already
adjusted his status, but we will have to remove conditions later this year and then
he will want to become a dual citizen at some point down the road. We had to use
wedding money for AOS fees (combined with EAD, etc etc!) and that was 700.00
then! I have no idea how we would have paid a fee like you're talking about now.
We work, but we just make ends meet most of the time. It's very easy to sit up
there on your high horses when you don't have to struggle to pay your bills. I could
care less if it cuts the stupid process by two months.....NO WAY. A fee increase
this large is uttely *ridiculous*.

M.
attributes.title: Comment Submitted By Michelle (Surname Unknown)
